Love is celebrated in February. This custom brings joy to some and sorrow to others. Remember GOD’s love for us has no beginning and no end. His word tells us: “Love covers a multitude of sin.” Let’s celebrate GOD’s love for us!

Meditate on these verses to gain wisdom:

- Week 1  
  - 1 Psalms 117
- Week 2  
  - 2 John 16:27
- Week 3  
  - 3 Proverbs 10:12
- Week 4 
  - 1 John 4: 7-8
